      • start

        public void start()
           throws Exception
        Description copied from class: MDWConnectionPool
        This can be overriden to set pool size and borrow timeout for each start/restart. The super method must be called at the end of the overriding method.
        Overrides:
        start in class MDWConnectionPool
        Throws:
        Exception

      • processWaitingRequests

        public void processWaitingRequests(boolean processCertifiedMessagesAsWell)
        Process all waiting requests. Optionally schedule all blocked certified messages first.
        Parameters:
        processCertifiedMessagesAsWell - If true, schedule all blocked certified messages first
